currentVerticalTVContent: Media that is currently shown on vertical TV:
currentScheduleTVContent: Images that are currently shown on TV for schedule:
currentHorizontalTVContent: Media that is currently shown on horizontal TV:
confirmDeleteImage: Are you sure you want to delete the image?
noContentTablet: There are currently no pictures for selected classroom.
noContentVerticalTV: There is currently no media for selected vertical TV.
noContentSchedulelTV: There is currently no media for selected schedule TV.
noContentHorizontalTV: There is currently no media for selected horizontal TV.
tooltipMaxNumberOfSharedTabletImage: Number of shared pictures for classrooms cannot be more than 5.
tooltipMaxNumberOfTabletImage: One classroom cannot have more than 5 pictures.
tooltipMaxNumberOfVerticalTVImage: Vertical TV cannot have more than 5 pictures.
tooltipMaxNumberOfSchedulelTVImage: Schedule TV cannot have more than 5 pictures.
tooltipMaxNumberOfHorizontalTVImage: Horizontal TV cannot have more than 5 pictures.
tooltipMaxNumberOfHorizontalTVVideo: Horizontal TV cannot have more than 5 videos.
errorWrongFileFormat: Selected file format is not supported. Please select a file with format .jpg, .png or .gif.
errorWrongImageResolutionForTablet: Selected image does not have the required resolution! Please select an image with resolution of 800x1240.
errorWhileFetchingImagesForClassroom: An error occurred while fetching images for classroom.
errorWhileUploadingImageForClassroom: An error occurred while uploading the image for classroom.
errorWhileDeletingImageForClassroom: An error occurred while deleting the image for classroom.
errorWhileFetchingLocations: An error occurred while fetching locations containing classrooms.
errorWrongImageResolutionForVerticalTV: Selected image does not have the required resolution! Please select an image with resolution of 1080x1920.
errorWrongImageResolutionForHorizontalTV: Selected image does not have the required resolution! Please select an image with resolution of 1920x1080.
errorWrongVideoResolutionForHorizontalTV: Selected video does not have the required resolution! Please select a video with resolution of 1920x1080.
picture_existing_shared: The selected image already exists in shared images.
picture_max_limit: It is not possible to upload image for selected classroom, because it already has maximum number of images(5)
create_failed: An error occurred while uploading the image for classroom. Please try again later.
errorWhileLoggingIn: An error occured while trying to log in.
